document.docAuthor: Menzel, Frank, Smith, Jane E. & Chandler, Peter J.
document.docOrigin: Zoological Journal of the Linnean Society 146 (1)
document.masterDocTitle: The sciarid fauna of the British Isles (Diptera: Sciaridae), including descriptions of six new species

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The sciarid fauna of the British Isles (Diptera: Sciaridae), including descriptions of six new species
Zoological Journal of the Linnean Society

subSubSection.paragraph:
Material examined :
Black Park , Buckinghamshire , 1 male ,
27.vi.1941
, Richards leg. ( BMNH )
.
Burnham Beeches , Buckinghamshire , 3 males ,
23.v.−7.vi.1995
, all Ismay leg. ( HRI , PPCM )
.
Farley Down, Hampshire , 1 male [ paratype of
Trichosia basdeni
], 1 female ,
20.v.1936
, Edwards leg. ( BMNH )
.
Farnham Royal , Buckinghamshire , 2 males ,
27.v.1934
[ paratypes of
Trichosia basdeni
, but dates as 21.v.−24.v and locality as Temple in Freeman (1983a) ]; 1 male ,
28.v.1934
(all reared), all Basden leg. ( BMNH )
;
6 males ,
21.v.− 26.v.1934
(reared), Basden leg. ( NMS )
.
Frilford Heath , Oxfordshire , 1 male ,
25.v.−15.vi.1991
, Porter leg. ( PPCM )
.
Lundy Island , Devon , 1 female ,
26.vii.− 27.vii.1972
, Lane leg. ( BMNH )
.
Milham Ford School , Oxford , Oxfordshire , 1 male ,
18.v.2001
; 1 male , 1 female ,
29.v.−4.vi.2002
, all Webb leg. ( PPCM )
.
Newmarket , Cambridgeshire , 1 female ,
18.ix.1888
, Verrall leg. ( UMO )
.
Stokeford Heath , Dorset , 1 male ,
20.v.2001
, Gibbs leg. ( PDGB )
.
Temple , Berkshire , 1 male ,
26.v.1934
[ holotype of
Trichosia basdeni
]; 1 female ,
28.v.1934
; 1 female ,
2.vi.1934
; 1 female ,
9.vi.1934
[ paratypes of
Trichosia basdeni
but not same date as male as in Freeman (1983a) ] (all reared), all Basden leg. ( BMNH )
;
3 females ,
26.v.−4.vi.1934
(reared), Basden leg. ( NMS )
.
The Loke , Norwich , Norfolk , 1 male ,
5.vii.1987
; 2 males ,
10.viii.1987
; 1 male ,
5.v.1988
; 3 males ,
5.vi.−13.vi.1989
; 1 male ,
21.viii.−24.viii.1989
; 1 male ,
28.iv.−4.v.1990
; 1 male ,
2.v.−6.v.1992
; 14 males ,
15.v.−18.v.1992
; 9 males ,
15.v.− 25.v.1992
; 1 male ,
18.v.−23.v.1992
; 8 males ,
21.v.− 23.v.1993
, all Laurence leg. ( DEI , PBLN )
.
The Oaks , Cambridgeshire , 1 male ,
ix.1998
, C.W. Plant leg. ( PPCM )
.
Tunbridge Wells , Kent , 1 female ,
3.vi.1986
, Verrall leg. ( UMO )
.
Wellesbourne , Warwickshire , 1 male ,
24.v.−27.vi.2001
, J.E. Smith leg. ( HRI )
.
No locality details, England , 1 male ,
3.v.1924
(reared), Hamm leg. ( UMO )
.
Ecological notes : found in broad-leaved and mixed woodland; school grounds with old poplars; calcareous grassland; sandy heathland; garden. Reared from nests of blackbird, thrush, decoy nest. v–ix

Taxonomic note : The type series of
Trichosia basdeni
according to Freeman (1983a: 163) ought to be 4 males and 3 females .
However , he incorrectly transcribed some of the data. The specimens from Farnham Royal , Buckinghamshire , 2 males ,
27.v.1934
( paratypes )
were given as Temple , Berkshire , 2 males
, 21.v.−24.v and the specimens from Temple, Berkshire, 1 male , 26.v.1934 ( holotype ); 1 female , 28.v.1934 ; 1 female , 2.vi.1934 ; 1 female , 9.vi.1934 (all paratypes ) were given as 3 females , 26.v.1934 ;
2 males ,
21.v.−24.v.1934
.
